body: What's with the recent surge of old ass doujins? I'm seeing doujins that were uploaded like 5-7 years ago being re-released again. What gives? Do ya'll like to overflood your servers and databases with duplicated shit?
SIUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU Also, this is like 2nd new release Nisekoi doujin I've seen this week, weird but appreciated
